body_html: tf.identity doesn't actually copy the value of the variable (if you want a copy something like +0 will do). For the new variables I'm working on there'll be a read op which does act like it makes a copy.
body_text: tf.identity doesn't actually copy the value of the variable (if you want a copy something like +0 will do). For the new variables I'm working on there'll be a read op which does act like it makes a copy.
body: tf.identity doesn't actually copy the value of the variable (if you want a copy something like +0 will do). For the new variables I'm working on there'll be a read op which does act like it makes a copy.
